articles.title: Mathematical model explains how hollow-core fibers guide light with ultra-low data loss - Phys.org
articles.description: Scientists at the University of Bath have developed a mathematical model to explain how antiresonant hollow-core fibers guide light in a way that keeps data loss ultra-low. Until now, scientists had no complete explanation for this well-observed phenomenon.
